name: @arach/vif
description: Declarative screen capture for macOS - agentic asset generation

scripts.build:agent: swiftc -O -o dist/vif-agent src/agent/main.swift -framework Cocoa -framework Carbon && npm run build:app-bundle
scripts.build:app-bundle: mkdir -p 'dist/Vif Agent.app/Contents/MacOS' 'dist/Vif Agent.app/Contents/Resources' && cp dist/vif-agent 'dist/Vif Agent.app/Contents/MacOS/' && cp scripts/Info.plist 'dist/Vif Agent.app/Contents/'

author: Arach Tehrani
